item.description:
OK, to switch things up and try to accomodate some members who can't make Fridays, February's meetup will be on a Saturday!

PLEASE note, the reservation is for ***6:30***. This is because we are meeting on a Saturday and have such a large group, I had to take the time they gave me.

This month we are going to do MEXICAN at Don Jose Tequilla's(not to mention a few margaritas)! See the link for their menu at Don Jose Tequila's. The menu looks fantastic and it looks like they have quite an authentic flare.

The owner was very helpful, but because we are such a large party and it is a Saturday, they will not be able to do individual checks. So, please be sure you plan accordingly. He also took a deposit, so hopefully you guys will be willing to be patient when I work on the bill. I am sure it won't be a problem, but I just wanted to let you all know.

In order to get your opinion regarding bill payment, I've added another poll again(yes, I know, but it's for your own good!) to vote on your preferred method of handling the check. Whichever seems the most popular selection, I will do my best to accomidate. Regardless, I will be making every effort to discuss options of payment at the beginning of each event from this point forward, in order to meet the needs of those attending.

Should we fill up and you are still interested in attending, please enter a "no" RSVP and put a note stating that you want to be wait-listed. If spots open up, I will contact you in order of RSVP.
PLease be sure to update your RSVP should your plans change. I look forward to seeing everyone there!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the front. I am plus sized, have long red hair and wear glasses.
item.why: We're good people and it will be fun!

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: The Rhode Island Dining Out February Meetup- SATURDAY- Don Jose Tequilas
